items.sentence: Tom was buried in his hometown, just a block from where he was born.
Chapters 1, 5 and 7 are the easiest to understand. Read those first.
The river's crystal-clear water practically begged us to swim in it.
A person without a mother and father is like a lute without strings.
The last time I asked Tom to do anything for me was three weeks ago.
I took the bus in order to reach the destination before it got dark.
I suddenly saw myself reflected in a window pane and it startled me.
I guess this desk will serve the purpose until we can get a new one.
I slipped and fell on the crosswalk, just when the light turned red.
I've already completed four out of six tasks on my to-do list today.
